page.title: 17A FAMILY WEEKEND 1
page.content: On Saturday I got up at about 8.30. I got washed and dressed and went downstairs for my breakfast which Mum had cooked.We had: Cereal(Corn Flakes)and Bacon and Egg. I watched the Saturday morning TV show until about ten which had music and cartoons.I had to go out then to the Community College to pay for the events in the Summer Playscheme I wanted to go in for.I found my Mum had to sign the sheet so it was back home again.Got it done eventually. My friend called around and we went into the town(Kingsbridge).We looked in all the shop windows for the 'odd-objects' competition which is part of the 'Fair Week'. Back at home we had a 'Veal and Ham' pie for lunch.I did the washing up with my Dad.He usually works on Sat., he's a plumber) but he had today off.
